Description: This introductory course will teach you the basics of playing the piano, starting with chords and rhythm, before moving on to playing full songs.
Excerpt: This introductory course will teach you the basics of playing the piano, starting with chords and rhythm, before moving on to playing full songs.
Modules: Chords 101 - The Building Blocks of Music,Rhythm 101 - The Heartbeat of Music,Your First Songs
